title: What is the best way to act in response to trolls?

replies.body:
Just mute and keep playing. Even if they begin harassing you directly just ignore it. They're are after a response after all. Don't give them one. Focus solely on your own game play so that there's nothing you can be at fault with and simply report them when the game is over. It's an unfortunate part of League but Riot is working on a way to combat this. 

Best of luck!
Pretty much this. Always make sure to report them at the end of the game.
Good advice, thank you. I guess this is how I mostly try to handle it, but sometimes trolls end up making me so upset about this game. :(

look we all know that some pple say what they wann say on the Internet coz you and i don't know where they live, or what they look like. But  i bet you they wont say what they  say to you on the internet in real life.. or to your face. ive only play lol for few months now..man the things that pple say's on the Internet.. look don't worry about what pple say. Play the game  like how you always play.

The best way is to just sort of laugh it off. Like oh you just tried to 1v5 them? lelz
If you argue with them they'll troll so much more, if you ignore them they'll do more to try and get a rise out of you.
Just chuck in a "lol" or a "rekt" or a "dayuumm get it bbygurl" and the game'll go a lot smoother, trust me. lol
Works for me anyway.

It can be fun to use a bit of reverse psychology on them, and push the trolling right back in their face even. It's got me some great laughs (but be polite!) and even got some of the trolls laughing with me :)

You do need to be careful with doing this though, if you notice they sound angry or frustrated leave it alone and just mute them, you're better off for it. E.g. they might be blaming you for their bad play, and if you laugh it off they might get even madder.

Keep cool, and have a laugh where you can!

say they need to stop being a dick and then get banned by riot and then riot don't do shit about the trolls and afk and dc and smerfs 

:}

Responding to trolls in a similar matter is probably the worse way to handle this situation. In addition. Riot is currently working on a new tribunal system that is designed to combat these "trolls and ark and dc and smerfs".

You can either just mute them or say lel to every negative thing they say to you, sometimes when people don't get the response they think they will they stop it. I find even in lobby if people are starting to act in such a manner I'll chuck them on my block list.

As a fellow Bronzie (Div 2 at the moment) I feel you pain, some days it feels like they're everywhere you turn. Here's a couple of tips that I've found helpful:

a) Obviously if they get abusive, use that mute button liberally. Don't feel like you need to take their attitude one bit. Like DW Aatrox has mentioned already, they're looking for a response, so try not to give it to them.

b) While you shouldn't engage with them try not to be silent in chat! start communicating more with the rest of your team, try to make it sound positive, point out when/where people did good. Everyone gets down when a game doesn't go well but like any team game/sport the more you try to communicate and stay positive the better mood the team will be in - which helps everyone play better!

c) Look for duo partners, this board even has a section for finding others, if you can find people to duo with that are reliable and positive then you've significantly reduced the chance of getting a troll on your team. (not everyone you meet or try duoing with is gonna work out but keep at it, throw me an add if you want)

d) This one is totally anecdotal (ie I have no evidence this is true apart from my own experience) I've started avoiding playing ranked during the weekend and mostly just play on weekday nights, obviously the population on the server changes throughout the day and depends on what day it is and I've just found I seem to get better teammates and less trolls on weekdays as opposed to weekends. 

Stay positive mate, not everyone is a troll! 
Happy Hunting.

Surrender.  Or call their bluff - you'd be surprised how many trolls change their tune when you start doing what they do. Toxic ppl can be muted but trolls ruin games. The game is pretty much done so Move on.
